de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap

Class Bitmap32Analyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Bitmap32Analyzer

  • public class Bitmap32Analyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Analyzer for Bitmap32 and Bitmap32Sequence. It counts colors by their kind and collects distinct colors. Additionally it creates a suggestion object for color type.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bitmap32Analyzer.Suggestion
      This is an object with a suggestion how to save the analyzed bitmap or sequence.

      • getTransparentNonZeroCount

        public long getTransparentNonZeroCount()
        Gets the count of somewhat bogus transparent pixels. This means pixels with alpha = 0 but RGB != 0.
        Returns:
        A long integer containing the count of transparent but colored pixels.
